catalog_info.title: Experimental Inorganic Chemistry
catalog_info.notes: Chemistry 40 and either Chemistry 27 or 30, or permission of the instructor.
catalog_info.description: An introduction to experimental problems encountered in the synthesis, isolation, purification, characterization, and identification of inorganic compounds, with an emphasis in air-free synthetic techniques and spectroscopic characterization methods specifically applicable to complexes containing transition metals.
